snippet: Prosecutors investigated an allegation that a former chairman of President Lee Myung-bak’s ruling Grand National Party tried to buy votes in a party leadership race.
abstract: Prosecutors in South Korea investigate an allegation that Park Heetae, a former chairman of President Lee Myung-bak’s ruling Grand National Party, tried to buy votes in a party leadership race.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors investigated an allegation that a former chairman of President Lee Myung-bak’s ruling Grand National Party tried to buy votes in a party leadership race.

headline.print_headline: South Korea: Accused of Vote Buying, Lawmaker Is Urged to Resign
